# Welcome to nutriverse

**nutriverse** is an integrated collection of R packages designed to support and facilitate nutrition data analysis.

**nutriverse** is also a community of nutrition data analysts who use R language for statistical computing. Members of the community support each other through the development of robust and performant R packages as tools for their analytical tasks, and through open and accessible technical guidance and impactful peer-to-peer learning.
